sentences.en: As a result , many believed that " It is virtually barefaced robbery. "
sentences.cn: “ 这简直就是赤裸裸的抢劫 ”.

sentences.en: It's barefaced robbery asking such a high price for that old bicycle!
sentences.cn: 那辆旧自行车要价如此之高真是无耻的敲诈.

sentences.en: Not barefaced ground takes equestrian wind of the boss.
sentences.cn: 不要露骨地拍老板的马屁.

sentences.en: Oh, come you know, this is too barefaced.
sentences.cn: 唔,喂, 你们知道, 这简直太无耻了.

sentences.en: Some politicians will tell their voters many barefaced lies.
sentences.cn: 一些政客会对选民说出许多公然露骨的谎言.

sentences.en: To tell a barefaced lie to your friends will create bad relationships.
sentences.cn: 告诉朋友厚颜无耻的谎言,将会造成不良的关系.

sentences.en: Why are you telling such barefaced lies ?
sentences.cn: 你为什么要说这种无耻的谎言？

words.tran_cn: 公然的；厚颜无耻的；不戴面具的

trans.tran_en: used to describe a remark or action that is clearly untrue or unpleasant, and that shows that you do not care about offending someone
